segments.text: What am I supposed to do with this plastic cup ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That cup is for a urine sample .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This particular test calls for you to urinate into the cup after you have urinated a little into the toilet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When I finish , what should I do then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You need to leave the cup in the cubby in the restroom , and the lab tech will get it from the other side .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What is my doctor testing me for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If there are bacteria in your urine , it could mean an infection somewhere .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will I know the results right away ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your doctor will be contacting you with the results .
segments.speaker: S2
